suite.name: ExcelTestCase

test.name: Verify format of data from Each cell

kw.name: Open Excel
kw.doc: Open excel file Arguments: | File | Filename with fullpath to open and test upon |

kw.name: Get Row Count
kw.doc: Return the Row count of the given sheet Example: | Open Excel | C:\Data\ExcelTest.xlsx | | Get Row count | Sheet1 |

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Column Count
kw.doc: Return the column count of the given sheet Example: | Open Excel | C:\Data\ExcelTest.xlsx | | Get Column count | Sheet1 |

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Read Cell Data By Coordinates
kw.doc: Return the value of a cell by giving the sheetname, row value & column value Example: | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | SheetName | Row Number | Column Number | | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | Sheet1 | 1 | 1 | To pass integer arguments | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | Sheet1 | ${1} | ${3} |

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Read Cell Data By Coordinates
kw.doc: Return the value of a cell by giving the sheetname, row value & column value Example: | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | SheetName | Row Number | Column Number | | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | Sheet1 | 1 | 1 | To pass integer arguments | Read Cell Data By Coordinates | Sheet1 | ${1} | ${3} |

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Get Regexp Matches
kw.doc: Returns a list of all non-overlapping matches in the given string.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
